tourBios.otherInfo: Member of the BUY.COM TOUR in 1999...Was a rookie on the PGA TOUR in 2001...Made the cut in seven of 30 PGA TOUR events in 2001 with two top-25 finishes...Shared the first-round lead at The Honda Classic after posting a 7-under 65. Tied for 27th...Tied for ninth at the Shell Houston Open for his best finish of the year and collected a career-best $88,400 paycheck...Played on the Canadian Tour in 2000. Won the Canadian Tour MTS Classic. He began the final round three shots behind Mark Brown of New Zealand and stormed to the top of the leaderboard with five birdies over the final six holes at Pine Ridge G.C. in Winnipeg. Finished sixth on the 2000 Canadian Order of Merit...Played in 26 BUY.COM TOUR events in 1999 and finished in top 10 twice and the Top-25 four times...Played a little on the Canadian Tour in 1997 and 1998...Played in the 1996 Australasian Tour Foodlink Queensland Open as an amateur, finishing T40th...Runner-up in 1996 Southeastern Amateur Championship and quarterfinalist in 1994 and 1995 Australian Amateur Championship...Reached semifinals of 1993 Australian Amateur Plate...Wife Margaret is Canadian and he spends part of the year in Toronto...Joined Geoff Ogilvy and Stephen Allan as the three Australians to survive 2000 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament.

tourBios.otherInfo: Rookie on the PGA TOUR in 2001. No Prior PGA TOUR experience. ... Played on the Canadian Tour in 2000. Won the Canadian Tour MTS Classic. He began the final round three shots behind Mark Brown of New Zealand and stormed to the top of the leaderboard with five birdies over the final six holes at Pine Ridge G.C. in Winnipeg. ... Finished sixth on the 2000 Canadian Order of Merit. ... Member of 1999 BUY.COM TOUR. Played in 26 events in 1999 and finished in top 10 twice and the Top-25 four times. ... Played a little on the Canadian Tour in 1997 and 1998. ... Played in the 1996 Australasian Tour Foodlink Queensland Open as an amateur, finishing T40th. ... Runner-up in 1996 Southeastern Amateur Championship and quarterfinalist in 1994 and 1995 Australian Amateur Championship. ... Reached semifinals of 1993 Australian Amateur Plate. ... Wife Margaret is Canadian and he spends part of the year in Toronto. ... Joins Geoff Ogilvy and Stephen Allan as the three Australians to survive 2000 Qualifying School.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T20th in 2008 at the Seaforth Country Classic.
